ISSUE.TITLE: Update DNS Documentation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description I tried to add DNS servers to my podman network as described in the documentation [here](https://docs.podman.io/en/latest/markdown/podman-network-update.1.html) and it suggest you can provide a list of IPs. This does not seem to be valid any more.
